title.narrative: Fiscal consolidation program for Rio Grande del Sur
N/A
N/A
Programa de consolidacion fiscal para Rio Grande del Sur

description.narrative: Component I. Fiscal management strengthening. This component aims at strenghtening local tax revenues as well as improving the public finances balance to reduce the fiscal deficit in a sustainable manner. Component II. Quality of expenditure. This component aims to strenghten the government's capacity to manage its expenditures in a more efficient and transparent manner. Component III. Public investment. this component will strengthen the government's capacity to manage its public investments, including the institutional framework for planning, evaluation and execution of investment programs.
